hero.title: Pandas/Polars, But Better
hero.subtitle: Process billions of rows in seconds. Familiar Python API. 100x faster than Pandas. Zero configuration to start.

features.title: Performance Without Compromises
features.subtitle: Everything you love about Pandas, with Rust speed
features.feature1_desc: Pandas-identical syntax. Migrate your code in minutes. Zero learning curve for data scientists.
features.feature2_desc: Optimized Rust engine. Automatic parallel processing. Handles datasets that don't fit in memory.
features.feature3_desc: Query your DataFrames with pure SQL. Intelligent query optimizer. Support for complex JOINs.
features.feature4_desc: Process huge files without loading into memory. Support for CSV, Parquet, Arrow, JSON. Native lazy reading.
features.feature5_desc: Automatic GPU operations when available. CUDA/ROCm integration. Transparent to the user.
features.feature6_desc: Install via pip. Works out-of-the-box. No heavy dependencies. Binary wheels for all platforms.

benchmarks.title: Real Benchmarks
benchmarks.subtitle: Comparison with Pandas and Polars on 10 million row datasets
benchmarks.note: Measurements on Intel Xeon 16 cores, 64GB RAM. Dataset: NYC Taxi.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Use for free forever, scale when you need

cta.title: Ready to accelerate your data analysis?
cta.subtitle: Start for free. No credit card required.
